Style sisters already! Royal fans go wild for Princess Lilibet's traditional dress and knee socks that are just like Princess Charlotte's (and could she be wearing dad Prince Harry's red toddler shoes?)
06/07/23 03:03
The two-year-old daughter of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex (pictured left) was pictured with Harry at an Independence Day parade in Montecito just hours before her grandfather King Charles III attended his second Coronation ceremony in Edinburgh. Princess Lilibet wore a patterned blue dress, white socks and red shoes, and was seen peering out at the motorcade as it passed during the California celebration on July 4. The classic look was similar to one worn by Princess Charlotte (pictured right) as she bid farewell to Canada alongside Prince George, and their parents, the Prince and Princess of Wales, then the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, following an eight-day tour of the country in 2016. Lilibet's sweet outfit also appeared to be a nod to her father, with her red Mary Jane style shoes resembling the same ones worn by Prince Harry as a child in the mid-1980s (pictured inset).
